section.name: Repos products
section.p: Repos.se is the concept and the product we could sell.
Repos.se has a mail account at repos.se@gmail.com. Staffan remembers the password if you remind him of his computer (the first).
Repos.se is owned by Optime data

subsection.name: ordbehandlare.se
subsection.p: This is for proving the concept. A perfect WebDAV application where we see how well it works.
Ordbehandlare.se has a mail account at ordbehandlare@gmail.com. Staffan remembers the password if you remind him of his computer (the first).
Ordbehandlare.se and .com is owned by Optime data

subsection.name: Coordinator
subsection.p: Coordinator 2.5 at www.coo.se is our current project management application. It builds on a relational database and cannot be integrated into anything. However it shows what collaboration software needs to be able to do.
Coordinator 3 will be based on repos.se
Coordinator and coo.se is owned by Com-onweb AB.
